channel.title: AzRoleWatcher
channel.description: Continuously monitor roles and permissions in Microsoft Entra ID and Azure.

item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: 47be4a87-7950-4631-9daf-b664a405f074
Display name: Monitoring Policy Contributor
Description: Allows read access to all monitoring data, update permissions for monitoring settings and permissions to deploy and remediate Azure Monitor alert policies.
Link: https://management.azure.com/47be4a87-7950-4631-9daf-b664a405f074?api-version=2022-04-01

item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: 225efd4d-4ca0-42a1-ae53-5f233ba23c73
Display name: Liftr Elastic Owner
Description: Grants full access to manage Elastic resources
Link: https://management.azure.com/225efd4d-4ca0-42a1-ae53-5f233ba23c73?api-version=2022-04-01

item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: 285ce6d6-fa11-43bd-94ef-42a9b3740bfd
Display name: Policy Enrollments Contributor
Description: Allows the creation and modification of policy enrollments
Link: https://management.azure.com/285ce6d6-fa11-43bd-94ef-42a9b3740bfd?api-version=2022-04-01
